name: Patriot Excavating
description: Specializes in site-work, water and sewer service, and demolition for residential and commercial projects

name: HCE
description: A certified Women Business Enterprise (WBE) and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise (DBE) offering site preparation, utilities, structural foundations, and hauling solutions. They identify as a minority-owned excavation and trucking company

name: Indiana Excavating Services LLC
description: Established in 2016, this company employs Union Operators & Union Laborers for quality and efficient construction projects

name: Poindexter Excavating
description: In business since 1974, they offer comprehensive excavation services including pre-construction, project management, grading, and utilities, utilizing a large fleet of equipment

name: Estes Excavating Inc.
address: Information not available (Serves Jeffersonville, Clarksville, and Clark County, IN)
description: Provides site prep services, including clearing, grading, demolition, and land excavation, for commercial construction projects since 1974

name: Lamb Excavating
address: Information not available (Serves Indianapolis and surrounding areas)
description: A full-service excavation contractor specializing in sewer line repair and replacement, septic installation, land clearing, grading, and foundation excavation

name: Black Diamond Excavating
description: Serving central Indiana since 1996, they specialize in commercial and residential excavation projects, including foundations, septic systems, demolition, and utilities

name: Powers & Sons Construction Co. Inc.
address: Gary, IN (with an office in Indianapolis, IN)
description: A well-established African-American-owned construction firm founded in 1967, offering construction management, design-build, and project management services. While not exclusively excavation, they are a prominent Black-owned construction company in Indiana

name: Pure Construction
description: A Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) with over 25 years of combined experience in general contracting, commercial construction, and HVAC services. They partner with developers to hire minority subcontractors

name: Cliff's Construction
address: Information not available (Listed in a directory for Westfield, IN)
description: Identified as a Black-owned business specializing in full home remodels, carriage house builds, kitchen/bathroom renovations, roofing, and gutter replacement. While not solely excavation, they are involved in construction services
